The Editorial Post

"All the news that's not fit to print"

The Editorial Post is the place for you to read stories about issues that you care about. No story on this site is intended to be 100% objective. They are instead, your opinions on issues important to you.

We are the newest place to obtain your news and view your outside world. Keep watching this site for future opinions or e-mail us issues you feel we should include or respond to something already posted.

Each week one submission will be featured as our "opinion of the week."

Why can't it be yours?

The issue of the week is "shootings in our schools". Check out our society section to read our first submission on the topic.If you have an opinion on that topic or anything else, e-mail your submissions to editorial_post@hotmail.com.

It is time for you to be heard
